column1: `oemof-solph <https://oemof-solph.readthedocs.io>`_, A model generator for energy system modelling and optimisation (LP/MILP),

`oemof-thermal <https://oemof-thermal.readthedocs.io>`_, "Tools to model thermal energy components (compression heat pumps, concentrating solar plants, thermal storages and solar thermal collectors) as an extension of oemof-solph ",
`CyDeTS <https://github.com/oemof/cydets>`_, Cycle Detection in Time Series (CyDeTS). An algorithm to detect cycles in times series along with their respective depth-of-cycle (DoC) and duration,
`demandlib <https://demandlib.readthedocs.io>`_,  Generate load profiles for elctricity and heat demand,
`feedinlib <https://feedinlib.readthedocs.io>`_, Calculate feedin timeseries for fluctuating renewable energy source from Open Data weather data,

`TESPy <https://tespy.readthedocs.io>`_, "Thermal Engineering Systems in Python (TESPy). Powerful simulation toolkit for thermal engineering plants such as power plants, district heating systems or heat pumps",
`windpowerlib <https://windpowerlib.readthedocs.io>`_, Calculate the power output of wind turbines,
